categories: Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Impervious was a Star Destroyer.

It was constructed at the Kuat Drive Yards shipyards over Kuat in 3 ABY. Shannon Voorson was able to slice its name, along with the names of several other Star Destroyers, and gave it to her cousin Deen Voorson, a member of the Rebel Alliance.
